headline: Brown & Brown announces key leadership appointments in Retail segment
summary: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla., Oct. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brown & Brown is pleased to announce several strategic updates to its Retail segment leadership team, reinforcing the company’s commitment to delivering world-class solutions and accelerating collaboration across its global footprint. As part of its ongoing integration efforts following the acquisition of Risk Strategies, Brown & Brown is focused on unlocking new opportunities for growth, collaboration and our ability to scale. To help us me
